title: الإِلْغَاءُ وَالتَّعْلِيقُ
titleEn: Cancellation and Suspension of Heart Verbs
description: Learn about الإلغاء (canceling) and التعليق (suspending) - two phenomena that affect the governance of أفعال القلوب (verbs of the heart like ظَنَّ and عَلِمَ).

notes.title: Review: Verbs of the Heart
content: أَفْعَالُ الْقُلُوبِ (verbs of the heart) are verbs expressing mental states: perception (ظَنَّ، حَسِبَ، خَالَ، زَعَمَ), certainty (عَلِمَ، وَجَدَ، رَأَى), and transformation (جَعَلَ، اِتَّخَذَ، صَيَّرَ). These verbs take two objects (مَفْعُولَيْنِ).

However, unlike regular verbs, the governance of أفعال القلوب can be canceled (الإلغاء) or suspended (التعليق) under certain conditions. Understanding these phenomena is essential for advanced grammar.
keyPoints: Governance can be affected by position or particles

examples.english: I thought Zayd was standing (normal governance)
I knew the matter was easy (two objects)
I considered him truthful
I imagined the work was difficult

notes.title: What is الإلغاء (Cancellation)?
content: الإلغاء is the cancellation of the verb's governance when it comes AFTER its objects (مُتَأَخِّر). When a verb of the heart follows its logical objects, its governance is weakened and can be canceled.

In إلغاء, the first 'object' becomes a مُبْتَدَأ (nominative subject) and the second becomes its خَبَر (nominative predicate). The verb of the heart becomes like a parenthetical insertion with no grammatical governance.
keyPoints: Occurs when verb comes AFTER objects

examples.english: Zayd is standing, I thought (زَيْدٌ = مبتدأ، قَائِمٌ = خبر)
The matter is easy, I knew
Muhammad is truthful, I thought
The work is difficult, I imagined

notes.title: Conditions for الإلغاء
content: الإلغاء requires specific conditions: 1) The verb must be from أفعال القلوب, 2) The verb must come AFTER the two words it would normally govern, 3) The speaker chooses to treat the sentence as مبتدأ + خبر rather than giving the verb governance.
When the verb is in the middle (between the two words), إلغاء is also possible but less common. The choice between إعمال (governing) and إلغاء (canceling) is often stylistic.
keyPoints: Verb must be from أفعال القلوب
Verb must come after its logical objects
Or verb is in the middle position
Choice between إعمال and إلغاء is stylistic

examples.english: Zayd, I thought, is standing (verb in middle)
Zayd is standing, I think (إلغاء)
Zayd standing I thought (still governing)
The truth is clear, I knew

notes.title: What is التعليق (Suspension)?
content: التعليق is the suspension of the verb's governance due to an intervening particle that has صدارة (priority/frontness) in the clause. These particles 'block' the verb from governing what follows.

The verb retains its meaning but cannot grammatically govern. The sentence after the particle functions as a complete sentence (جملة) that is 'in the position of' the two objects: في محل نصب سدّت مسدّ المفعولين.
keyPoints: Caused by intervening particles with صدارة
Particles: ما، لا، إنّ، لام الابتداء، الاستفهام

examples.english: I knew that certainly Zayd is standing (لَ blocks governance)
I thought Zayd was not standing (مَا blocks)
I wondered: is Zayd standing? (استفهام blocks)
I knew that Zayd is standing (إِنَّ blocks)

notes.title: Particles that Cause التعليق
content: Several particles cause التعليق because they must come at the start of their clause (صدارة): 1) لام الابتداء (إِنَّ زَيْدًا لَقَائِمٌ), 2) مَا النافية, 3) لَا النافية, 4) إِنْ النافية, 5) Interrogative particles (أ، هل، مَن، مَا، أَيّ, etc.).
When these particles appear after a verb of the heart, the verb cannot extend its governance past them. The entire clause becomes في محل نصب (in the accusative position) as a unit.
keyPoints: All have صدارة: must be clause-initial

examples.english: I knew that the truth is certainly victorious
I thought lying was not beneficial
I wondered: is Zayd traveling?
I saw which of them was best

notes.title: Difference Between الإلغاء and التعليق
content: الإلغاء and التعليق both affect verb governance but differ fundamentally. In إلغاء, governance is CANCELED due to word order - there is no governance at all. In تعليق, governance is SUSPENDED - the verb still has an effect, but it applies to the whole sentence.
إلغاء: verb truly loses governance → مبتدأ + خبر. تعليق: verb governs the entire clause → الجملة في محل نصب. This distinction affects i'rab analysis significantly.
keyPoints: تعليق: governance suspended, جملة في محل نصب
إلغاء: due to word order (verb after)

examples.english: Zayd is standing, I thought (no governance at all)
I thought that Zayd is certainly standing (جملة في محل نصب)
Knowledge is light, I knew
I knew that ignorance is not light

exercises.prompt: إِذَا جَاءَ فِعْلُ الْقَلْبِ بَعْدَ مَفْعُولَيْهِ يَجُوزُ _____ عَمَلِهِ
exercises.promptEn: When a verb of the heart comes after its objects, its governance may be _____

exercises.prompt: زَيْدٌ قَائِمٌ ظَنَنْتُ - زَيْدٌ هُنَا _____ مَرْفُوعٌ بِالإِلْغَاءِ
exercises.promptEn: Zayd is standing, I thought - زَيْدٌ here is a _____ in nominative due to cancellation

exercises.prompt: إِذَا جَاءَتْ أَدَاةٌ لَهَا الصَّدَارَةُ بَعْدَ فِعْلِ الْقَلْبِ يَحْدُثُ _____
exercises.promptEn: When a particle with priority comes after a verb of the heart, _____ occurs

exercises.prompt: عَلِمْتُ لَزَيْدٌ قَائِمٌ - الْجُمْلَةُ بَعْدَ عَلِمْتُ فِي مَحَلِّ نَصْبٍ سَدَّتْ مَسَدَّ _____
exercises.promptEn: I knew that Zayd is standing - the sentence is in accusative position, standing for the _____

exercises.prompt: مِنْ أَدَوَاتِ التَّعْلِيقِ: لَامُ الاِبْتِدَاءِ، مَا النَّافِيَةُ، وَأَدَوَاتُ _____
exercises.promptEn: Among the particles of suspension: emphasis lam, negative ما, and _____ particles

exercises.prompt: فِي الإِلْغَاءِ يُلْغَى الْعَمَلُ تَمَامًا، أَمَّا فِي التَّعْلِيقِ فَالْعَمَلُ _____
exercises.promptEn: In cancellation, governance is completely canceled; in suspension, governance is _____

exercises.answer: Cancellation of verb governance (due to word order)
Suspension of verb governance (due to intervening particle)
Stood in place of the two objects (a clause replacing objects)

exercises.prompt: The phenomenon where a verb of the heart loses its governance due to coming after its objects
The phenomenon where an intervening particle blocks verb governance
The property of certain particles that requires them to be clause-initial
